member.name: T:Sample.RequestXmlTest
member.remarks: This example simple deserializes and request from a file and the reserializes it to display. Tests the request deserializer and serializer.

member.name: M:Sample.RequestXmlTest.WriteEntry(System.String,Nwc.XmlRpc.LogLevel)
member.summary: LoggerDelegate compliant method that does logging to Console. This method filters out the LogLevel.Information chatter.

member.name: M:Sample.RequestXmlTest.Main(System.String[])
member.remarks: This method opens an XML file as a StreamReader and then asks XmlRpcRequestDeserializer.Parse to deserialize it into an XmlRpcRequest. The resultant request is now displayed.
